title: Short-Term Professional Development Program for Academic Library Librarians Based on Adult Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic library operations procedures
context.additional_context: Customized practitioner course in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing field-applicable competency development through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Explain principles of designing educational programs that reflect the characteristics of adult learners.
Develop a librarian education activity plan applying transformative learning theory.
Develop continuous learning strategies using the Community of Practice (CoP) model.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
